quotes.quote: A fool is made more of a fool, when their mouth is more open than their mind.
People talk too much. Humans aren't descended from monkeys. They come from parrots.
We have two ears and one mouth so that we can listen twice as much as we speak.
The trouble with her is that she lacks the power of conversation but not the power of speech.
Human nature is, by definition, a talkative one, imprudent, indiscreet, gossipy, incapable of closing its mouth and keeping it closed.
You can not control the thought, but you can control the tongue.
Before opening your mouth to talk, you should open your mind to think.
If talk is cheap, then being silent is expensive. And many people it seems, can't afford to buy into it.
When you have nothing to say, say nothing.
The talkative man speaks from his mouth, the eloquent man speaks from his heart.
I have learned silence from the talkative, toleration from the intolerant, and kindness from the unkind; yet strange, I am ungrateful to these teachers.
I'm a talkative person because I like to get to know a person and I like you to get to know me.
A loud mind is greater than a loud mouth.
For a silent person, your eyes are very talkative.
Much talking is the cause of danger. Silence is the means of avoiding misfortune. The talkative parrot is shut up in a cage. Other birds, without speech, fly freely about.
We have two ears and one mouth and we should use them proportionally.
When you talk, you are only repeating what you already know. But if you listen, you may learn something new.
In my circle of friends, I've always been loud and funny and talkative. But as soon as I step out of that circle, I get very quiet and introspective. I don't want the spotlight on me.
Talkativeness is a symptom of deep-seated pessimism. Without it there would be no pessimistic literature.
Great minds discuss ideas; average minds discuss events; small minds discuss people.
Weak people talk and do not act, strong people act and keep quiet.
Love is talkative passion.
An introvert talks more than an extrovert because when the mouth is closed, the mind is opened.
Not every person that speaks less than you do is more ignorant than you are.
Vanity is a relative of Pride; Vanity is talkative, pride is silent. When Vanity and Pride get together, they could make monstrosities.
